name: Athlete Performance (Intermediate)
description: Focuses on speed, agility, and endurance for athletic performance.

exercises.name: Box Jumps
exercises.description: Explosively jump onto a sturdy box or platform.

exercises.name: Medicine Ball Slams
exercises.description: Lift a medicine ball overhead and slam it to the ground.

exercises.name: Ladder Drills
exercises.description: Perform fast footwork drills through an agility ladder.

exercises.name: Sprint Intervals
exercises.description: Sprint at maximum effort for a short distance, then rest.

exercises.name: Barbell Squats
exercises.description: Perform squats with a barbell on your back.

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.description: Press a barbell or dumbbells overhead.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Hold a straight line from your head to your heels.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: Twist your torso from side to side with your feet off the ground.

exercises.name: Foam Rolling
exercises.description: Use a foam roller to release muscle tightness.

exercises.name: Light Jog
exercises.description: A slow and easy jog to promote blood flow.

exercises.name: Clean & Jerk
exercises.description: A complex Olympic lift involving a clean and an overhead jerk.

exercises.name: Push Press
exercises.description: An overhead press that uses momentum from your legs.

exercises.name: Long Jumps
exercises.description: Jump as far as you can from a standing position.

exercises.name: Treadmill Sprints
exercises.description: Alternate between sprinting and resting on a treadmill.

exercises.name: Rowing Machine
exercises.description: Row for distance on a rowing machine.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: A full-body exercise that involves a squat, push-up, and jump.

exercises.name: Dynamic Stretching
exercises.description: Stretches that involve movement to prepare your body for a workout.

exercises.name: Yoga Flow
exercises.description: A series of yoga poses to improve flexibility and strength.

name: Bodybuilding Hypertrophy (Beginner)
description: Designed for muscle growth and aesthetic development.

exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.description: Lie on a bench and press a barbell up from your chest.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.description: Press dumbbells up from your chest on an incline bench.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Flyes
exercises.description: Perform a flying motion with dumbbells to target your chest.

exercises.name: Triceps Pushdowns
exercises.description: Push a bar down on a cable machine to target your triceps.

exercises.name: Overhead Dumbbell Extension
exercises.description: Extend a dumbbell overhead to target your triceps.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldowns
exercises.description: Pull a bar down to your chest to target your lats.

exercises.name: Seated Cable Rows
exercises.description: Pull a handle towards your abdomen to target your back.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Rows
exercises.description: Pull a dumbbell up to your chest to target your back.

exercises.name: Barbell Curls
exercises.description: Curl a barbell up to your shoulders to target your biceps.

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
exercises.description: Curl dumbbells with a neutral grip to target your biceps.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: Push a platform away from you with your legs.

exercises.name: Leg Extensions
exercises.description: Extend your legs to target your quads.

exercises.name: Hamstring Curls
exercises.description: Curl your legs to target your hamstrings.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.description: Press dumbbells overhead to target your shoulders.

exercises.name: Lateral Raises
exercises.description: Raise dumbbells to your sides to target your shoulders.

exercises.name: Deadlifts
exercises.description: Lift a barbell off the floor to target your entire body.

exercises.name: Incline Bench Press
exercises.description: Press a barbell up from your chest on an incline bench.

exercises.name: Bent-Over Rows
exercises.description: Pull a barbell up to your chest to target your back.

exercises.name: Leg Curls
exercises.description: Curl your legs to target your hamstrings.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.description: Raise your heels to target your calves.

exercises.name: Light Cardio (e.g., walk, swim)
exercises.description: A slow and easy cardio session to promote recovery.

name: Model Physique (Toning & Definition)
description: Focuses on toning, definition, and overall physique aesthetics.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: A classic bodyweight exercise for your chest, shoulders, and triceps.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Rows
exercises.description: Pull a dumbbell up to your chest to target your back.

exercises.name: Lateral Raises
exercises.description: Raise dumbbells to your sides to target your shoulders.

exercises.name: Plank with Hip Dips
exercises.description: From a plank position, dip your hips from side to side.

exercises.name: Goblet Squats
exercises.description: Hold a dumbbell at your chest and squat down.

exercises.name: Glute Bridges
exercises.description: Lie on your back and lift your hips to target your glutes.

exercises.name: Walking Lunges
exercises.description: Step forward into a lunge, then repeat with the other leg.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.description: Raise your heels to target your calves.

exercises.name: HIIT (e.g., Jump Ropes, Burpees)
exercises.description: High-intensity interval training to burn calories.

exercises.name: Pilates / Yoga
exercises.description: Improve your flexibility and core strength.

exercises.name: Burpee Box Jumps
exercises.description: A combination of a burpee and a box jump for a full-body challenge.

exercises.name: Renegade Rows
exercises.description: Perform a row from a plank position to target your back and core.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: A cardio exercise that also works your core.

exercises.name: Thrusters
exercises.description: A combination of a squat and an overhead press.

exercises.name: Pull-ups (assisted if needed)
exercises.description: Pull your body up to a bar to target your back and biceps.

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.description: Raise your legs to target your lower abs.

exercises.name: Supermans
exercises.description: Lift your arms and legs off the floor to target your lower back.

exercises.name: Side Planks
exercises.description: Hold a plank on your side to target your obliques.

exercises.name: Brisk Walk / Light Cycle
exercises.description: A light cardio session to promote recovery.

exercises.name: Full Body Stretch
exercises.description: Stretch all your major muscle groups.
